member.name: T:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient
member.summary: Database client for PostgreSQL.

member.name: P:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.ConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string used to connect to the database.

member.name: P:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Timestamp format. Default is MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss.fffffff tt.

member.name: P:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.TimestampOffsetFormat
member.summary: Timestamp format with offset. Default is MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss.fffffff zzz.

member.name: P:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.MaxStatementLength
member.summary: Maximum supported statement length.

member.name: P:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.Settings
member.summary: Database settings.

member.name: E:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.QueryEvent
member.summary: Event to fire when a query is handled.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.#ctor(DatabaseWrapper.Core.DatabaseSettings)
member.summary: Create an instance of the database client.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create an instance of the database client.
member.param: The IP address or hostname of the database server.
The TCP port of the database server.
The username to use when authenticating with the database server.
The password to use when authenticating with the database server.
The name of the database with which to connect.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.Dispose
member.summary: Tear down the client and dispose of resources.

member.summary: List all tables in the database.
member.returns: List of strings, each being a table name.

member.summary: List all tables in the database.

member.summary: Check if a table exists in the database.

member.summary: Show the columns and column metadata from a specific table.

member.summary: Show the columns and column metadata from a specific table.

member.summary: Describe each of the tables in the database.
member.returns: Dictionary where Key is table name, value is List of Column objects.

member.summary: Describe each of the tables in the database.

member.summary: Create a table with a specified name.

member.summary: Drop the specified table.

member.summary: Drop the specified table.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.GetPrimaryKeyColumn(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the name of the primary key column from a specific table.
member.param: The table of which you want the primary key.
member.returns: A string containing the column name.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.GetColumnNames(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a list of the names of columns from within a specific table.
member.param: The table of which ou want to retrieve the list of columns.
member.returns: A list of strings containing the column names.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.GetUniqueObjectById(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a DataTable containing at most one row with data from the specified table where the specified column contains the specified value. Should only be used on key or unique fields.
member.param: The table from which you wish to SELECT.
The column containing key or unique fields where a match is desired.
The value to match in the key or unique field column. This should be an object that can be cast to a string value.
member.returns: A DataTable containing at most one row.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.GetUniqueObjectByIdAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a DataTable containing at most one row with data from the specified table where the specified column contains the specified value. Should only be used on key or unique fields.
member.param: The table from which you wish to SELECT.
The column containing key or unique fields where a match is desired.
The value to match in the key or unique field column. This should be an object that can be cast to a string value.
member.returns: A DataTable containing at most one row.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.Select(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},ExpressionTree.Expr)
member.summary: Execute a SELECT query.
member.param: The table from which you wish to SELECT.
The maximum number of results to retrieve.
The fields you wish to have returned. Null returns all.
The expression containing the SELECT filter (i.e. WHERE clause data).

member.summary: Execute a SELECT query.
member.param: The table from which you wish to SELECT.
The maximum number of results to retrieve.
The fields you wish to have returned. Null returns all.
The expression containing the SELECT filter (i.e. WHERE clause data).

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.Select(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[])
member.summary: Execute a SELECT query.
member.param: The table from which you wish to SELECT.
The maximum number of results to retrieve.
The fields you wish to have returned. Null returns all.
The expression containing the SELECT filter (i.e. WHERE clause data).
Specify on which columns and in which direction results should be ordered.

member.name: M:DatabaseWrapper.Postgresql.DatabaseClient.SelectAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},ExpressionTree.Expr,DatabaseWrapper.Core.ResultOrder[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
